tool_description: An API that shows the latest news on  NEPSE (Nepal Stock Exchange).
name: NEPSE News
title: NEPSE News

api_list.name: Get individual news source news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the news from a certain source only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nepse-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/merolagani"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nepse-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nepse-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nepse-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Nepse related news
api_list.description: You can get all the latest news regarding the NEPSE via this endpoint.
